item.title: Trump dismisses concerns over back-and-forth levies, says 'tariffs could go up'
item.description: President Trump says economy is in a "period of transition" and can't predict if U.S. will fall into a recession

item.title: Pope Francis pens prayer thanking hospital staff, as he shows 'mild improvement'
item.description: The Holy See Press Office said the pontiff has shown "a good response to the therapies." He was hospitalized on Feb. 14 for a case of bronchitis.

item.title: Secret Service says it shot an armed man near the White House after a confrontation
item.description: A man who was brandishing a firearm in Washington, D.C., was shot by Secret Service officers near the White House on Sunday morning, the Secret Servic...

item.title: This synagogue calls itself 'anti-Zionist.' Here's what that means in practice
item.description: Tzedek Chicago calls itself anti-Zionist congregation, meaning it does not support a Jewish nation-state.

item.title: This Women's History Month, readers tell NPR about the women who changed their lives
